column5: What a great time!!!! got a new fly rod, some musky baits, a hoodoe and a new hat...  met Roger ( BPSbassman) had a hoot of a time running around to the employyes with beards and giving them the staredown! Roger it was great to met you, I enjoyed our chat, hope to do it on the water in 07..  what a great store!!! awesome service even though it was a big place...  Beware fishies
Awesome Jamie  Great store eh??  Some baits for our spring outing???  Only 6 months to go to use the 'skie baits LOL
The wife and I were going to stop in this week but I couldn't stand the tought of  the big crowds. We did however get over to LB's and managed to get alot of new fishing toys.
You made my day at BPS Jamie. Would love to get out with you next year.

Yes Sir! and a new fly rod, have some CRAZY ideas for 07!!!  Roger you are an awesome guy, wish I could of chatted with you more...  damn I made you day. Good and sorry to hear!  I was so mad I did not get to JB's.... have a few bucks ( of wife does not know about cash) I was looking to spend!

I very briefly stopped in at BPS on Boxing Day, I don't know what I was thinking because the parking lot was a zoo with all the sale shoppers (not just for BPS).  It's nice to save money but not at that price!  Mike
Gonna try fly fishing for musky next year?
i blew over $400 there but don't think I'll ever need another reef runner again  \ also picked up a camera and a nice combo with a signature series rod and a diawa sealine reel
what the frig is a hoodoe?  Perhaps its something I would like to be owning
hoodoe is a hoodie that is filled with deer hair for warmth, they are awesome!  BBR... you are onto me!
I have a BPS gift card from Christmas. Didn't even think to check the sales this week. Hope I get a chance to stop by.

I was at Bass Pro yesterday too, also picking up a few Muskie Baits, finally broke down and sprung for a Believer. Looks real sweet. Great store but I could swear the last time I was there  big Lindy M/G spinnerbaits were like 13 bucks and yesterday it was like 22. What gives? I mean, I'm pretty sure it's still somewhere around 11 or 12 bucks at LeBarons. That's just too large a price discrepancy to shrug off. It was the lure that I actually went for more than anything else really. Maybe I misread the pricing but I don't think so. Just goes to show it pays to shop around a bit I guess....Cheers, Weeds
